Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • edge - 2-D image edge massaging.
  • fill - Baade-Lucy background "filling" algorithm.
  • hstpos - Plot the position of HST on a map of the world
  • hsubtract - Baade-Lucy background subtraction algorithm.
  • ils - Iterative Least Squares image restoration.
  • immean - Compute mean of an image and save value as task parameter.
  • jimage - Create a jitter image from U2,U3 coordinates in a table.
  • lgrlist - Expand a list of images and group numbers
  • newredshift - Change the redshift of spectra
  • registration - Compute registration parameters and resample unaligned
  • data files

  • (Type "help playpen opt=sys" for more information about the playpen package)
